about_the_game:
Add some extra liveliness to your adventurer’s guilds and pubs with the NPC Female Adventurers Vol.1!

TK.Projects latest SE pack includes 120 new female voice clips you can add to cutscenes and events to bring NPCs to life. 12 unique characters offer you a good selection for possible combat-curious NPCs. Introduce your heroes to brave adventurers, polite receptionists, tough guild masters, and more with this pack!

Features:

* 120 different phrases and sayings
* 12 characters, 10 SE per character
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
